item.title: Note
item.description: Life is Short: How to Spend It Wisely 人生很短暂，如何度过。 Today, I want to chat about something that’s been on my mind lately: time. You know, that elusive thing that seems to slip through our fingers like sand. As we grow older, our relationship with time changes. We become more aware of how quickly it passes and how nothing stays the same forever. It’s a bit of a bummer, I know, but stick with me, it’s not all doom and gloom!
